channel.title: dictionary on Always Developing
channel.description: Recent content in dictionary on Always Developing

item.title: ConcurrentDictionary AddOrUpdate method
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The C# ConcurrentDictionary implementation has a convenient AddOrUpdate method (unlike the Dictionary implementation) - this method allows for a value to try be added to the concurrent dictionary and if the key already exists, then update with a different value. Dictionary updates First we’ll take a look at how to handle updates when using a Dictionary. First, a Dictionary<string, int> is instantiated and a few items are added to the dictionary.
